|1effect=If unit or foe initiates combat after moving to a different space, grants Atk/Def+6 and Atk/Def+X to unit during combat (X = number of spaces from start position to end position of whoever initiated combat; max 4), and also, if unit initiates combat, reduces damage from foe's attacks by X × 3 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials). If foe's attack triggers foe's Special, reduces damage dealt to unit by X × 3 during combat (excluding area-of-effect Specials).
|1cost=300
|1required=Atk/Def Clash 3
}}
